predicate.note: Frames file for 'pockmark' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: It was a heady experience for the pockmarked and slightly built Mr. Noriega, who was known to his friends as Cara la Pina -- pineapple face.

example.name: bummer
example.text: The brief summer hailstorm pockmarked John's brand-new car.
